name: Love Bunny Purse
description:
This would be perfect for a little girl as a gift bag filled with goodies for Birthday or Valentines Day. This little purse is made with felt, ribbon and Chenille. The front has a bunny, heart and flowers all appliqued on. The heart has the word “Love” embroderied on it.

	The purse measures about 9” wide and 10” long. I made sure to attached the buttons on really tight but be cautious if giving this to a little one under the age of four.

	I can also personalize this purse if you would like- the name can be added to the heart. When ordering just be sure to let me know if you would a name added. And don’t forget about gift shipping!

name: Mommy and Baby Owl Purse
description:
This would be perfect for a little girl as a gift bag filled with goodies for Birthday or Valentines Day. This little purse is made with felt, ribbon and fleece. The front has a mommy and baby Owl appliqued to the front. The pair are sitting on a branch with heart shaped flowers.

	The purse measures about 9” wide and 10” long. I made sure to attached the buttons on really tight but be cautious if giving this to a little one under the age of four.

	Don’t forget about gift shipping!

name: Little Girl Purse with Heart pocket
description:
This would be perfect for a little girl as a gift bag filled with goodies for Birthday or Valentines Day. This little purse is made with felt, ribbon and Chenille. The big heart in the middle is a pocket that can used to hide little goodies in.

	The purse measures about 7 1/2” wide and 8” long. I made sure to attached the buttons on really tight but be cautious if giving this to a little one under the age of four.

	I can also personalize this purse if you would like- the name can be added to the heart. When ordering just be sure to let me know if you would a name added. And don’t forget about gift shipping!

	♥♥Please check profile for timeline on personalized orders or you can convo me for estimated shipping date.♥♥
